pr_title: Check Reactive Redis Client for healthcheck

timeline.bodyText: So we're not exactly on par with the MongoDB impl here where the name of the default reactive client is different?
timeline.author: gsmet

replies.bodyText: My reason was to produce healthcheck status for each individual redis client without caring much whether that was done with a reactive client or a blocking one (as it does not matter much).
replies.author: machi1990

replies.bodyText:
I think we should be consistent but that can probably be done in another PR.
Merging.
replies.author: gsmet
